subhed: Voter safety, the ability for all citizens to vote and restrictions on campaigning are just some of the obstacles to a presidential election that is being demanded by Donald Trump, all of which Volodymyr Zelensky said he would be prepared to face within 60 to 90 days.

title: Thailand says four soldiers killed in Cambodia conflict, denies Trump truce claim
subhed: At least 24 people have been killed in the conflict this week, including four Thai soldiers the defense ministry said died in the border area on Saturday. Thai PM Anutin Charnvirakul said Donald Trump 'didn't mention whether we should make a ceasefire' during their Friday phone call.

title: How French spies, police and military personnel are betrayed by advertising data
subhed: Using easily accessible advertising data, Le Monde was able to pinpoint the identities, home addresses and daily routines of several dozen people working for sensitive official entities.

subhed: The year 2025 was marked by the shock of Donald Trump's return to the White House. An unprecedented wave of extreme brutality has shaken the world like never since 1945, observes the economist in his column.

title: Paris Agreement: Ten years later, key players look back on 'incredible alignment of stars'
subhed: Le Monde takes a look back at the the signing of the Paris Agreement in the French capital on December 12, 2015, a major geopolitical agreement reached after two weeks of intense negotiations that aimed to limit global warming to 'well below' 2°C and at 'pursuing efforts' to keep the temperature increase to 1.5°C.

title: The mysterious 'knocker' scaring elderly women in a Brittany town
subhed: For more than two years, a prowler has been knocking on doors and shutters during the night in a village in Brittany, France, creating a climate of fear among his preferred targets: elderly women. Authorities were slow to take the case seriously.

title: 'Trump's ideological challenge to Europe is more dangerous than the security one'
subhed: The Trump administration has cast itself as the protector of 'Western civilization.' Elon Musk wants the European Union to be dismantled. It is up to European democrats to contest this role and fight this battle, argues Le Monde columnist Sylvie Kauffmann.
